workshoptitle: Send Data from Oracle GoldenGate to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure GoldenGate

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: St up your environment
tutorials.description: Set up your environment for use with your free or paid OCI account

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create OCI GoldenGate resources
tutorials.description: Create your OCI GoldenGate deployment and database registration

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Connect Oracle GoldenGate to Autonomous Transaction Processing
tutorials.description: Connect Oracle GoldenGate to its Source Database

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create a trusted connection between Oracle GoldenGate and OCI GoldenGate
tutorials.description: Use a self-signed certificate to create a trusted connection

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Send the Oracle GoldenGate Trail file to OCI GoldenGate
tutorials.description: Create an Extract, Distribution Path, and Replicat

tutorials.title: Lab 6: (Optional) Use the Admin Client view Extract statistics and log messages
tutorials.description: Connect to the Marketplace Oracle GoldenGate Admin Client

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
